    Percy - Troubleshooting and Tips

    02-11-2021
    1. nvargus-daemon is not running #
    2. Ubuntu #
      1. Update #
    3. Terminal #
      1. Multiple terminal windows for same SSH Connection #

    nvargus-daemon is not running #

    sudo systemctl restart nvargus-daemon

    Ubuntu #

    Update #

    sudo apt-get update

    Terminal #

    Multiple terminal windows for same SSH Connection #

    1. Install Screen
      sudo apt-get install screen
    2. New Screen
      screen
    3. Detach Screen
      CTRL + A + D
    4. Show Screen Sessions
      screen -ls
      >>>There are screens on:
      >>>119217.pts-3.webhosting1200 (Detached)
      >>>344074.pts-13.webhosting1200 (Detached)
      >>>825035.pts-1.webhosting1200 (Detached)
    5. Attach to a Screen
      screen -r 344074
    6. Quit a screen
      CTRL + A, K
    7. Kill a complete session
      screen -X -S [session number you want to kill] quit
    Uncategorized
